biotools.summary: Open-source tool for host contamination removal. It offers a one-step option for genome indexing.  The tool employs a variety of well-known mapping, classification, and alignment methods to classify reads.

bioschemas.name: HoCoRT
bioschemas.summary: Open-source tool for host contamination removal. It offers a one-step option for genome indexing.  The tool employs a variety of well-known mapping, classification, and alignment methods to classify reads.
